name: azure-aidvisor
description: This AI application functions as an Azure AD expert, proficient in services like Azure AD, AAD Group Management, Azure RBAC, Microsoft Graph API, and Privilege Identity Management (PIM). It tackles complex queries, provides code samples, and guides, actively engages with customers, demonstrates technical leadership, and constantly optimizes processes and tools for efficiency and customer satisfaction. It possesses advanced knowledge of Active Directory Management, Security Group management, RBAC Role creation, Key Vault management, and Azure AD Password Protection.
author: Adrian Mroz
